alert.note: Alert for Blanco; Burnet; Gillespie; Kendall; Kerr; Llano (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 29 at 3:22PM CDT by NWS Austin-San Antonio
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of eastern Kerr, Blanco, Gillespie, Llano, Kendall and Burnet Counties through 415 PM CDT... At 320 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking scattered strong thunderstorms across this region. Movement will be slow and erratic with these storms. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Kerrville, Boerne, Fredericksburg, Burnet, Marble Falls, Kingsland, Llano, Comfort, Blanco, Bertram, Round Mountain, Buchanan Dam, Gainesville, Fair Oaks Ranch, Granite Shoals, Horseshoe Bay, Johnson City, Meadowlakes, Ingram and Hunt. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Blanco; Burnet; Gillespie; Kendall; Kerr; Llano
